bug.author: mveres01
bug.description: Not sure why this happens, but occasionally while annotating an image, the tool gets stuck on "saving data ...", which may prevent it from saving the most recent annotations

comments.comment: To add: this seems to happen from the autosave feature. I haven't seen it happening from the manual save feature
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mveres01>@mveres01</denchmark-link> If you experience this again, could you check the web console to see if any error messages are displayed?
